item.title: Oak/willow powercutter
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[scar]program WillowCutter;
{.include Osi.txt}
//==== Colors ====\
const
WillowLog1=2052699; //try to pick you own color of the logs if it dosen’t drop the logs
WillowLog2=4089712; //The same as above
Username=’’;
Password=’’;
procedure CutWillow;
begin
if
findcolor(x,y,923929,50,42,455,281)
or
findcolor(x,y,2308414,50,42,455,281)
then
wait(random(50)+500)
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait(random(100)+200)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(random(200)+500)
if findcolor(x,y,16776960,40,70,427,275)
then movemousesmooth(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(random(2000)+25000)
end;

procedure DropWillow;
begin
if findcolor(x,y,WillowLog1,574,214,730,45
then movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(random(100)+2000)
Dropcolor(WillowLog1);
dropcolor(WillowLog2);
wait(random(200)+1000)
end;

begin
repeat
CutWillow;
DropWillow;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

you should post it like this

Read full topic

item.title: Oak/willow powercutter
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

try converting to srl
movemosuecmooth and clicmouse are very detectable and will lead you tog etting banned
use thsi fucntion

Mouse(x,y,rx,ry,true)
Moves move and clikc at x,y with randomness of rx,ry pixels
its bascaily movemousesmoooth and clickmouse combined but not detectable =)

item.title: Oak/willow powercutter
item.dc:creator: @aznpride aznpride
item.description:
@aznpride wrote:

[color=orange][color=orange][color=orange][/color][/color][/color][font=Verdana]ok this will cut and drop oaks logs anywhere**no anti randoms from wat i have seen u will not get a full load it will drop after u cut some. no axe head finder or anything its a very simple oakcutter u should have more that one axe in ur inventoryi do not take credit for this i forgot who made this becuz sythe forums changed to vBulletin or somethingi dont know how to put in code sry[/font]

The OakCutter:

program OakCutter;
{.include Osi.txt}

const
OakLog1=4419213; //try to pick you own color of the logs if it dosen’t drop the logs
OakLog2=6326438; //The same as above
Username=’’;
Password=’’;

procedure CutOak;
begin
if
findcolor(x,y,4486295,50,42,455,281)
or
findcolor(x,y,5075056,50,42,455,281)
then
wait(random(50)+500)
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait(random(100)+200)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(random(200)+500)
if findcolor(x,y,16776960,40,70,427,275)
then movemousesmooth(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(random(2000)+25000)
end;

procedure DropOak;
begin
if findcolor(x,y,OakLog1,574,214,730,45
then movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(random(50)+100)
Dropcolor(OakLog1);
dropcolor(OakLog2);
wait(random(200)+1000)
end;

begin
repeat
CutOak;
DropOak;
until(false)
end.

just an edit of oakcutter so this is not really mine neither just needed to post for soem ppl that are noobs like me

The WillowCutter:

program WillowCutter;
{.include Osi.txt}
//==== Colors ====\
const
WillowLog1=2052699; //try to pick you own color of the logs if it dosen’t drop the logs
WillowLog2=4089712; //The same as above
Username=’’;
Password=’’;
procedure CutWillow;
begin
if
findcolor(x,y,923929,50,42,455,281)
or
findcolor(x,y,2308414,50,42,455,281)
then
wait(random(50)+500)
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait(random(100)+200)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(random(200)+500)
if findcolor(x,y,16776960,40,70,427,275)
then movemousesmooth(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(random(2000)+25000)
end;

procedure DropWillow;
begin
if findcolor(x,y,WillowLog1,574,214,730,45
then movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(random(100)+2000)
Dropcolor(WillowLog1);
dropcolor(WillowLog2);
wait(random(200)+1000)
end;

begin
repeat
CutWillow;
DropWillow;
until(false)
end.
